courseDetails.shortDescription: Produktion Von Visuellen Prompt-Produktive künstliche Intelligenz
courseDetails.longDescription:
Produktion Von Visuellen Prompt-Produktive künstliche Intelligenz


Wie generiert man visuelle Prompts mit künstlicher Intelligenz?


Die Bildproduktion hat sich in den letzten Jahren dank der Technologien der künstlichen Intelligenz stark verändert. Jetzt können nicht nur professionelle Designer, sondern jeder mit Hilfe von KI-gestützten Werkzeugen hochwertige Bilder erstellen. Um die Vorteile dieser Tools voll ausschöpfen zu können, ist es jedoch sehr wichtig, die richtigen Techniken zur Erstellung von Prompts zu kennen. Genau hier setzt das Training „How to Produce Visual Prompts with Artificial Intelligence?“ an.

Was werden Sie in dieser Schulung lernen?

Diese Schulung ist ein umfassender Leitfaden für alle, die den KI-gestützten visuellen Produktionsprozess verstehen und effektive Prompts erstellen möchten. Während der Schulung werden wir die folgenden Themen im Detail behandeln


Was ist eine durch künstliche Intelligenz unterstützte visuelle Produktion?

Entwicklung von visuellen Produktionstechnologien und verfügbaren Tools der künstlichen Intelligenz

Beliebte Plattformen wie MidJourney, DALL-E, Google Imagen 3

Was ist ein Prompt und warum ist er wichtig?

Die Auswirkungen von Prompts auf die künstliche Intelligenz

Wie schreibt man einen effektiven Prompt?

Strukturierte Prompt-Techniken

Methoden zur Erstellung klarer und unmissverständlicher Befehle

Auswirkungen von Farbe, Komposition und Stilfaktoren auf Prompts

Prompt-Strategien für verschiedene Arten der visuellen Produktion

Realistisches Bildmaterial erstellen

Vorbereitung von futuristischen und abstrakten Designs

Erstellen von architektonischem und industriellem Bildmaterial

Praktische Anwendungen und Live-Beispiele

Live-Prompt-Proben während der Ausbildung

Tipps und Tricks zum Erzielen gezielter Ergebnisse

Wer sollte daran teilnehmen?

Dieser Kurs ist für die folgenden Gruppen sehr nützlich:

Grafikdesigner und Illustratoren

Digitale Vermarkter und Social-Media-Manager

Werbeagenturen und Produzenten von Inhalten

Enthusiasten der künstlichen Intelligenz und Technologiebegeisterte

Jeder, der sich für visuelle Künste interessiert

Vorteile der Schulung

Die Teilnehmer werden am Ende der Schulung

Sie werden in der Lage sein, durch künstliche Intelligenz unterstützte visuelle Produktionswerkzeuge effektiv zu nutzen.

Sie erstellen schneller und professioneller Visuals.

Sie werden in ihren eigenen Projekten oder Unternehmen erfolgreicher sein, indem sie sich auf die Erstellung von Souffleusen spezialisieren.

Sie werden in der Lage sein, ihre Grenzen zu erweitern, indem sie ihre Kreativität mit künstlicher Intelligenz kombinieren.

Die Bedeutung von Schulungsinhalten

Heutzutage haben visuelle Inhalte einen großen Einfluss in der digitalen Welt. Egal, ob Sie eine Marke oder ein Kunstwerk entwerfen, die visuelle Qualität macht immer einen Unterschied. Um mit KI-gestützten Tools die richtigen Ergebnisse zu erzielen, ist jedoch eine effektive Eingabeaufforderung erforderlich. Mit dieser Schulung können Sie den visuellen Produktionsprozess mit KI bewusster und erfolgreicher gestalten.

In dieser Schulung lernen Sie, wie Sie die unbegrenzten Möglichkeiten der künstlichen Intelligenz optimal nutzen können. Denken Sie daran: Mit der richtigen Anleitung können Sie die Türen der KI-gestützten Kunst öffnen!
targetAudiences: Grafikdesigner und Illustratoren
Digitale Vermarkter und Social Media Manager
Werbeagenturen und Produzenten von Inhalten
Enthusiasten der künstlichen Intelligenz und Technologiebegeisterte
Jeder, der sich für bildende Kunst interessiert
Diejenigen, die sich für Geschäftsmodelle zur Erzielung von Einnahmen mit künstlicher Intelligenz interessieren
Prompt Engineering

courseDetails.title: Offensive Security Pathway
courseDetails.shortDescription: From Script Kiddy to Offensive Security General - From Absolute Beginner to Skilled Ethical Hacker!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Jarno Baselier’s Offensive Security Pathway is a comprehensive training program (+/- 47 hour) designed for aspiring cybersecurity professionals eager to develop expertise in offensive security. This meticulously structured course takes participants from foundational knowledge to advanced offensive techniques, ensuring a thorough understanding of the cybersecurity landscape. Beginning with no prior knowledge, learners will be introduced to essential offensive security concepts, fundamental cybersecurity principles, and the importance of ethical hacking. They will explore vital topics such as Windows and Linux basics, networking fundamentals, and scripting, laying the groundwork for their journey into offensive security.


As participants progress, they will delve deeper into critical skills, including virtualization, network protocols, and command-line interfaces necessary for effective system management. Basic social engineering tactics will prepare them for real-world scenarios where human factors significantly influence security outcomes. The course emphasizes practical
application, teaching students to utilize popular hacking tools like Nmap and Metasploit for vulnerability assessment and exploitation. They will learn to identify and exploit vulnerabilities in both Windows and Linux systems, gaining hands-on experience that is essential for a successful career in offensive security.


Advanced topics such as web attacks, post-exploitation techniques, and privilege escalation strategies will be covered, with a focus on Active Directory environments and sophisticated network attacks. This approach ensures that learners develop the real-world application and problem-solving skills needed in the field. Critical skills in documentation and reporting, alongside advanced persistence techniques and cloud exploitation, will also be introduced, enabling participants to navigate the complexities of modern cybersecurity challenges effectively.


Finally, this course prepares students for industry-recognized certifications such as CEH, OSCP, eCPTX, and PNPT. With an emphasis on advanced evasion techniques, exploit development, and threat hunting, participants will emerge from the program job-ready, equipped to tackle sophisticated cyber threats. By the end of this course, students will possess extensive knowledge, practical experience, and the confidence necessary to pursue rewarding careers in offensive security. Join us to transform your passion for cybersecurity into a successful and fulfilling career!


Course Learning path:

  • Start with Zero Knowledge: Begin with foundational concepts in cybersecurity, computer systems, and networking, ensuring that everyone, regardless of their background, can follow along.

  • Understanding the Basics: Dive into essential knowledge of Windows and Linux operating systems, networking fundamentals, and introduction to cybersecurity principles.

  • Grasping Offensive Security: Learn the principles of offensive security, ethical hacking, and legal practices. This prepares you for a career in cybersecurity.

  • Hands-On Lab Experience: Set up and configure a demo lab environment to practice skills in a safe and isolated setting. This practical experience is crucial for applying theoretical knowledge.

  • Basic Hacking Skills: Start using basic hacking tools and techniques to understand vulnerabilities in systems. Gain hands-on experience in vulnerability scanning and exploit development.

  • Web Application Security: Develop skills in identifying and exploiting web vulnerabilities, learning to hack applications and understand the OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities.

  • Advanced Hacking Techniques: As you progress, dive deeper into specialized hacking techniques, including advanced web attacks, privilege escalation, and exploitation of Active Directory.

  • Persistence & Evasion Techniques: Learn advanced persistence techniques for maintaining access to compromised systems, and study advanced evasion techniques to bypass security mechanisms.

  • Expert-Level Skills: Finally, master advanced topics such as shellcoding, exploit development, reverse engineering, and cloud exploitation, while preparing for professional certifications.

  • Job-Ready Skills: By the end of the course, participants will have extensive knowledge and practical skills, making them well-prepared for a job in offensive security and able to tackle widely recognized certifications.
targetAudiences: Beginners in Cybersecurity: Individuals with little to no prior knowledge in cybersecurity who are eager to start a career in the field of offensive security. This course provides a solid foundation and guides them through the necessary concepts and skills.

Aspiring Ethical Hackers: Individuals who have a keen interest in ethical hacking and wish to develop the skills needed to identify vulnerabilities in systems, applications, and networks, and understand the mindset of an attacker.

IT Professionals: Current IT practitioners looking to expand their skill set by gaining expertise in offensive security practices. This course can help IT support staff, network administrators, system engineers and developers transition into cybersecurity roles.
Security Enthusiasts: Individuals who have a passion for technology and security, and want to deepen their knowledge in offensive strategies to better understand and defend against cyber threats.

Career Changers: Professionals from other fields who are looking to pivot into cybersecurity. This course offers comprehensive training that prepares them for entry-level positions in offensive security.

Students and Recent Graduates: Individuals studying computer science, information technology, or related fields who want to enhance their resumes with practical skills and knowledge in offensive security.

Job Seekers in offensive Cybersecurity: Those actively seeking employment in the cybersecurity industry who need a structured learning path that equips them with the skills necessary to meet job requirements and prepare for certification exams.

By the end of this course, participants will possess extensive knowledge and hands-on experience, making them well-prepared to enter the workforce and pursue recognized certifications in the field of offensive security.

courseDetails.title: Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

courseDetails.title: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Certificate in Career Coaching by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


What is Career Coaching?

Career coaching is a collaborative process between a coach and a client (the coachee). The coach helps the client gain clarity and strategize to achieve their professional goals. This might involve anything from making a major career transition to navigating challenges in their current role


Main Areas of Career Coaching

Career coaching covers a wide range of focus areas. Some of the most common include:

  • Career Exploration: Helping clients define their strengths, interests, and ideal work environments.

  • Goal Setting: Working with clients to set actionable and achievable career goals.

  • Job Search Strategies: Creating effective resumes, cover letters, and improving interviewing skills.

  • Networking and Branding: Building professional networks and developing a strong personal brand.

  • Negotiation Skills: Coaching clients on how to negotiate salary, benefits, and promotions.

  • Leadership Development: Helping those looking to advance into leadership roles grow the necessary skills

  • Performance Enhancement: Identifying areas for improvement and providing strategies to excel in a current role.


How Career Coaching Skills Benefit Clients and Your Own Career

The skills involved in career coaching offer multi-faceted benefits:


Benefits for Consulting Practice

  • Enhanced Client Understanding: Develops deep skills for understanding client needs, goals, and challenges.

  • Goal-Oriented Communication: Provides frameworks for setting clear expectations and tracking progress.

  • Empowerment Strategies: Teaches how to empower clients to take ownership over their careers.

  • Diverse Toolkit: Develops skills like active listening, feedback, and motivational techniques – highly transferable in various consulting fields.

Benefits for Your Own Career Development

  • Self-Awareness: The process forces you to reflect on your own career journey, values, goals, and areas for development.

  • Proactive Mindset: Encouraging clients to take charge translates into your own approach, leading to greater career ownership.

  • Network Expansion: Increases exposure to professionals in various industries, broadening your network and potential opportunities.

  • Growth Mentality: Fosters a focus on continuous learning essential for success in any field.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to work as career coach, build a career or improve their knowledge.
